thread.section_title: Busbud Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Busbud | www.busbud.com
thread.title: Patrice M. Henry
thread.title_full: Busbud reviewed by Patrice M. Henry

author: Patrice M. Henry
title: Patrice M. Henry
text: They are great! Booked a bus ticket for the next day by accident because their website had a next day departure default when I was trying to leave the day of. Although it was a Saturday afternoon, I was responded to quickly and received an 80% refund due to the bus company's policies. Better than nothing!
